short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The fastest way to get notifications for the latest news and song updates

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Don't want to miss the latest news and songs updates? here is an extension for Google Chrome that sends you notifications for the latest news and song updates.

This Google Chrome extension will let you know about the recent news from hip hop, albums, videos and entertainment.

Voxlyrics is a Nigerian top media publisher organization, with the aim of promoting music artists, making sure that their songs are discovered around the globe.

❤ Why use this extension? ❤
- Get the latest news on hip hop singles, albums.
- Be in the know without a click.
- All updates are now fully automatic
- Desktop notifications now uses Chrome’s new notification center tray.
- Beautiful and usable news widget.
- Flexible And Nice Design.
